price: 46. (Ainsi en fut-il) du peuple de Noé qui était aussi un peuple de pervers.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
